token_info.name: The Unknown Sharpness
token_info.description: In the digital work "The Unknown Sharpness" (or The Unknown Sharp Portraits) (from The Unknown Portraits Series), new geometric portraits are generated with every HTML refresh. The possible combinations are endless. 16 element types are constantly being recombined in terms of color, position and size.  The works of The Unknown Portraits Series are digital drawings or paintings in which the artist addresses the "portraits" in the digital age - it's about avatars and profile pictures, face recognition and the handling of personal rights in today's world. It's about simplification. And it's about uniqueness.
